QuestData.Title: Oh Doloria, My Sweet Doloria
QuestData.Description:
What ho! We are quite the dashing pair of adventurers, aren't we?
Now that we have secured my belongings, a new path unfolds before us. I did not journey here simply to thwart the demon invasion, no! I came here in search of my beloved, my loved, Doloria. Whilst resting between slaying of dragons, I had a dream, nay, a vision. It told me Doloria had been kidnapped and taken to a floating city in the sky!
It must be Dalaran. Quickly, squire! Mount up and meet me at Dalaran's famous inn. Make haste!
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Doloria in the Legerdermain Lounge in Dalaran.
